item.description:
The Plainville Fire Department is holding a balloon launch and festival the last weekend in August.  The event has crafters, food, and a carnival atmosphere.  We will meet on Saturday morning at 6:00a.m. to watch the balloons go up.  After that we are going to hike on the Metacomet Trail from Route 4-Prattling Pond Rd to Route 372 in Plainville.  This will require spotting cars since it is a 6.3 mile thru hike.

This is the site on the fire department web site.  There is an FAQ section that will answer many of your questions.

http://www.plainvillefireco.com/Balloon_Festival.html

This is the mapquest site for the balloon festival site.  I have not been to this location so I do not have answers about site logistics or precise meeting spots.

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=NORTON+PARK,+PLAINVILLE,+CT&hl=en&ei=EZh4S7TeOYeYzAS7xJmQBQ&sll=41.659351,-72.878871&sspn=0.020007,0.038418&ie=UTF8&view=map&geocode=FdirewId6fSn-w&split=0&ved=0CBIQpQY&hq=&hnear=Norton+Park,+Plainville,+Hartford,+Connecticut+06062&ll=41.667719,-72.874632&spn=0.012408,0.01929&z=14&iwloc=A&source=embed

Part two is the hike information.  For those who will not be rising at dawn for the launch, folks will meet at the hike end at 9:00 a.m.  Meet at 440 New Britain Ave Plainville, rt. 372.  This is an office building with plenty of parking.  Once all have asemble, a few cars will shuttle hikers to the beginning.

http://mapq.st/JdX4ud

The start is the comuter lot at exit 39, I-84, on route 4 across from Prattling Pond Rd.  Highlights for this hike include Fitty Cents house up on Poplar Dr, Rattlesnake Mountain, Will Warren's Den, and the Pinnacle Point all with great views.

 

b]=== Legal Stuff ===[/b] By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Hot Air Balloon Launch/Hike Plainville CT
